Commands.Auto Crossbow: Group ranged BRV attack  Extra damage to machinery types
Commands.Drill: 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack  Extra damage to machinery types  Target: 3 turns DEF Down I
Commands.BRV Attack+: Melee BRV attack.  High turn rate.  Extra damage to machinery types
Commands.Chainsaw: 5-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%  Extra damage to machinery types  Self: 6 turns Machinery

Artifacts.Rapid Speed: Raises Speed by 10% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Marshal of the Machine Divison Boost: Increases the effects of Marshal of the Machine Divison by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Auto Crossbow: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Auto Crossbow by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Drill: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Drill by 10%

Passives.Auto Crossbow Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Auto Crossbow.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Drill Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Drill.
Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Auto Crossbow Charge: Increases the max uses of Auto Crossbow by 1.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Drill Charge: Increases the max uses of Drill by 1.
Passives.Marshal of the Machine Divison: Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns when using an HP attack on a Machine-type enemy.
Passives.Focused Attack: BRV damage   1.6 when attacking single target with group attack
Passives.Auto Crossbow Extension: Auto Crossbow use +2When using Auto Crossbow:  Slight damage boost  Moderately increased damage to machinery types  Inflicts 4 turns Sap  Higher turn rate
Passives.Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Drill Extension: Drill use +2When using Drill:  Tremendous BRV damage boost  Moderately increased damage to machinery types  Slight DEF Down boost  Inflicts MAX BRV Down I in addition to DEF Down  Higher turn rate

Weapons.Schwarz Lance CP: 15: Slightly raises all party members' Max BRV and Attack when an enemy is debuffed.
Weapons.Mythril Spear CP: 15: Increases the potency of Auto Crossbow and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Speed Up for 4 turns.
Weapons.Partisan CP: 35: Increases the potency of Drill and lowers its Action Delay.Increases the potency of Defense Down and extends its duration.Grants Small Attack Up for 4 turns.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ (Increases its potency and deals more damage to Machines).
Weapons.Trident CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Chainsaw.
